name: Kidnapped Elder Torntusk!
tooltip:
Kidnapped Elder Torntusk!Level 51

Primal Torntusk at Raventusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to rescue her mate, Elder Torntusk, from Jintha'alor.

You have been told that he is being held prisoner atop Jintha'alor, the Vilebranch capital city located in the southern region of the Hinterlands.
